entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint-Jérôme
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 12:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -9.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
